spec_data.Name: perl-Inline-CPP
spec_data.Description:
The Inline::CPP Perl module allows you to put C++ source code directly "inline"
in a Perl script or module. You code classes or functions in C++, and you
can use them as if they were written in Perl.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 01:59:36 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Write Perl subroutines and classes in C++
